Package org.skistation.services

Class WorkerService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.WorkerService
@Service public class WorkerService extends Object
Represents a worker service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the worker table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a new worker service with the specified worker repository.

      Parameters:
      worker - the worker to modify
      Returns:
